long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For the people who's heavily annoyed by the never-matching lines when copy & pasting from pdf file: your nightmare will be gone! Instead of pressing backspace and space bar over and over, why not let an extension do it for you?
For more information, check out my git hub link: https://github.com/anbaximeiza/Chrome_extension_no_more_next_line.
